import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { fetchAllOrdersAsync, selectOrders, selectOrdersTotal, } from "../../order/orderSlice"; import { ITEMS_PER_PAGE } from "../../../app/constants"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; function AdminOrders() { const [page, setPage] = useState(1); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const orders = useSelector(selectOrders); const ordersTotal = useSelector(selectOrdersTotal); useEffect(() => { const pagination = { _page: page, _limit: ITEMS_PER_PAGE }; dispatch(fetchAllOrdersAsync(pagination)); }, [dispatch, page]); return (
{orders.map((order) => ( ))}
Order Number Products Total Amount Status Actions
{order.id}
{order.items.map((item) => (
{item.title}
))}
Active
); } export default AdminOrders;
